attributes.action: recognize England, Wales, Northern Ireland, Scotland
attributes.additional_details: We live in the United Kingdom which is a country, that is made up of four countries. This e petition is for the UK government and the United Nation, to recognize England, Wales, Northern Ireland and Scotland as states of the United Kingdom, so that when the House of Lords is reformed though the House of Lords reform bill, the new elected senators would be in charge of constituencies that are within the four new states of the United Kingdom which is a country on its own.
